channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- HCL Traveler
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- HCL Traveler

item.title: CVE-2021-27778|2024-09-17T00:06:06.792Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20traveler
item.description: HCL Traveler is vulnerable to a cross-site scripting (XSS) caused by improper validation of the Name parameter for Approved Applications in the Traveler administration web pages. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute a malicious script to access any cookies, session tokens, or other sensitive information retained by the browser and used with that site.
